title: Evidence to support your appeal
descriptionPara1: Evidence is any information that supports your appeal such as a letter, written statement or medical report.
descriptionPara2: You can upload evidence now or post it in after you have submitted your appeal. You’ll receive the address after you’ve submitted your appeal.
descriptionPara3: You do not need to send or upload your Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN) because you are appealing online.

evidenceProvide.label: Would you like to upload evidence now?
